===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|せい|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せい}} ({{IPAchar|/tsjeŋ/}}). Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|精|tr=jīng}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|せい|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Adjectival noun====
{{ja-adj|infl=na|せい}}

# [[detailed]], [[conscientious]]
# [[pure]], [[refined]]

=====Inflection=====
{{ja-na|せい}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|せい}}

# [[polishing]], [[refining]]
# [[care]], [[conscientiousness]]
# something [[polished]] or [[refined]], particularly polished [[white rice]]
# [[vim]] and [[vigor]], [[energy]] in doing things
# [[life force]], [[vitality]], the energy of living
# one's [[emotion]]s, [[mind]], or [[soul]]
# the [[soul]] or [[spirit]] of a thing, particularly when [[appear]]ing on its own; a [[fairy]], a [[sprite]]
# [[semen]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|polishing}} {{ja-r|研磨|けんま}}
* {{sense|refining}} {{ja-r|精製|せいせい}}
* {{sense|polished rice}} {{ja-r|精米|せいまい}}; {{ja-r|白米|はくまい}}
* {{sense|care}} {{ja-r|念入り|ねんいり}}
* {{sense|vim}} {{ja-r|元気|げんき}}
* {{sense|vigor}} {{ja-r|精力|せいりょく}}
* {{sense|emotions}} {{ja-r|心|こころ}}
* {{sense|mind}} {{ja-r|精神|せいしん}}
* {{sense|soul}} {{ja-r|魂|たましい}}
* {{sense|spirit}} {{ja-r|精霊|せいれい}}
* {{sense|sprite}} {{ja-r|妖精|ようせい}}
* {{sense|semen}} {{ja-r|精液|せいえき}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|しらげ|yomi=k}}
Noun stem of verb {{m|ja|精げる|tr=shirageru||to polish, to refine}}, itself derived from {{m|ja|白|tr=shira||white|pos=form used in compounds, usually ''shiro'' on its own}} + {{m|ja|ぐ|tr=gu|pos=verbalizing suffix}}, originally just meaning {{m|en|whiten|to whiten something}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|しらげ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しらげ}}

# [[rice]] [[polishing]], rice [[milling]]
# [[polished]] or [[milled]] [[rice]]
# [[excellence]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|rice polishing}} {{ja-r|米磨|こめとぎ}}
* {{sense|polished rice}} {{ja-r|精米|せいまい}}; {{ja-r|白米|はくまい}}
* {{sense|excellence}} {{ja-r|優秀|ゆうしょう}}
